document_data.caption: The Plunge highlighted in red.
document_data.name: Plunge
document_data.mainbody: '''The Plunge''' was a short road that ran from the ruined town of [[Ilipur]] on the shore of the [[Dragonmere]], to the town of [[Elversult]] on the [[Dragon Coast]].{{Cite dragon/365/Backdrop: Cormyr|45}}
